HUD.SAVED_NAMES: Assign from saved names (Right-click: Select from saved names)
HUD.REFRESH_NAME: Generate a new name (Right-click: Configure settings)
HUD.GENERATE_DESCRIPTION: Generate a description (Right-click: Force refresh, even if one already exists)

CONFIG.PATREON_KEY_HINT: Enter your Patreon key here to unlock unlimited AI use.
CONFIG.USE_AI_HINT: Patreon supporters are not limited to 5 AI name or description generations per day.
CONFIG.NAMING_METHOD_HINT: Choose your default method for generated names.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_HINT: Custom name base for these creatures.
CONFIG.NUMBER_FORMAT_HINT: Custom number type for these creatures.
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_HINT: Custom name format for these creatures. Arrange {firstName}, {nickname}, {surname}, and {title} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Must have at least one of these four elements.
CONFIG.GENRE_PROPER_AI_HINT: Default genre for names generated with the Proper (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.LANGUAGE_PROPER_AI_HINT: Default language for names generated with the Proper (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.GENDER_PROPER_AI_HINT: Default gender for names generated with the Proper (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_PROPER_AI_HINT: Default name base for names generated with the Proper (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_PROPER_AI_HINT: Default name format for names generated with the Proper (AI) naming method. Arrange {firstName}, {nickname}, {surname}, and {title} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Must have at least one of these four elements.
CONFIG.GENRE_ADJECTIVE_AI_HINT: Default genre for names generated with the Adjective (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.LANGUAGE_ADJECTIVE_AI_HINT: Default language for names generated with the Adjective (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_ADJECTIVE_AI_HINT: Default name base for names generated with the Adjective (AI) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_ADJECTIVE_AI_HINT: Default name format for names generated with the Adjective (AI) naming method. Arrange {adjective} and {name} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Make sure to include both {name} and {adjective}.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_PROPER_HINT: Default name base for names generated with the Proper (Simple) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_PROPER_HINT: Default name format for names generated with the Proper (Simple) naming method. Arrange {firstName} and {surname} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Must have at least one of these two elements.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_ADJECTIVE_HINT: Default name base for names generated with the Adjective (Simple) naming method.
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_ADJECTIVE_HINT: Default name format for names generated with the Adjective (Simple) naming method. Arrange {adjective} and {name} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Make sure to include both {name} and {adjective}.
CONFIG.NAME_BASE_NUMBERED_HINT: Default name base for names generated with the Numbered (Simple) naming method.
CONFIG.NUMBER_FORMAT_NUMBERED_HINT: Default number type for names generated with the Numbered (Simple) naming method. (Number: 1, 2, 3; Roman: I, II, III; Letter: A, B, C)
CONFIG.NAME_FORMAT_NUMBERED_HINT: Default name format for names generated with the Numbered (Simple) naming method. Arrange {name} and {number} as desired, along with spacing and punctuation. Must have at least one of these two elements.
CONFIG.TITLE: Title
CONFIG.SAVE_TYPE_HINT: Save these settings for the creature, creature type, or creature subtype.
CONFIG.CREATURE_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH_HINT: Choose your default length for generated creature descriptions.
CONFIG.AUTO_NAME_NEW_TOKENS_HINT: If enabled, new tokens will be automatically named when they are created.
CONFIG.PROPER_NAME_WHITELIST_HINT: Names that should not be flagged as proper.
CONFIG.PROPER_NAME_BLACKLIST_HINT: Names that should be flagged as proper.
CONFIG.USE_SAVED_NAMES_FIRST_HINT: If enabled, saved names will be used before generating new ones.
CONFIG.SHOW_DESCRIPTION_IN_CHAT: Show Descriptions and Homebrew in Chat
CONFIG.SHOW_DESCRIPTION_IN_CHAT_HINT: If enabled, generated descriptions and AI homebrew content will appear in a chat card until dealt with.
CONFIG.TEMPERATURE_HINT: Assign the creativity level of the AI.  0 = Minimal, 1.8 = Very High.
CONFIG.USER_API_KEY_HINT: Enter your OpenAI API key here to use your own.
CONFIG.DEVELOPER_MODE_HINT: Turning this on will just make more console logs appear. You probably don't want this on unless you're a developer or trying to help us troubleshoot a problem.
CONFIG.DELETE_ALL_NAMES_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete all these names?
CONFIG.DELETE_ALL_DESCRIPTIONS_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete all these descriptions?
CONFIG.NAME: Name
CONFIG.CLICK_TO_EDIT: Click on the field's value to edit it
